languages.text: "Бог-Император, наш пастырь и страж, услышь горький клич раскаянья и смиренья".

traits.locale_text: "Бог-Император, наш пастырь и страж, услышь горький клич раскаянья и смиренья".

languages.text: "God-Emperor, our shepherd and warden, hear my sorrowful cry of remorse and humility."
languages.original_text: "Бог-Император, наш пастырь и страж, услышь горький клич раскаянья и смиренья".

traits.locale_text: "God-Emperor, our shepherd and guardian, hear my sorrowful cry of remorse and humility."
"God-Emperor, our shepherd and guardian, hear my sorrowful cry of remorse and humility."
"God-Emperor, our shepherd and warden, hear my sorrowful cry of remorse and humility."
"God-Emperor, our shepherd and warden, hear my sorrowful cry of remorse and humility."
"God-Emperor, our shepherd and warden, hear my sorrowful cry of remorse and humility."
"God-Emperor, our shepherd and warden, hear my sorrowful cry of remorse and humility."

languages.text: “神皇啊，我们的牧人，我们的守护者，请倾听我悔恨与谦卑的悲鸣吧。”
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, our shepherd and warden, hear my sorrowful cry of remorse and humility."

traits.locale_text: “神皇啊，我们的牧人，我们的守护者，请倾听我悔恨与谦卑的悲鸣吧。”

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}たちの羊飼いであり、監視者である神帝陛下よ。どうか、悔恨と謙遜の悲痛な叫びを、お聞きください」
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, our shepherd and warden, hear my sorrowful cry of remorse and humility."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}たちの羊飼いであり、監視者である神帝陛下よ。どうか、悔恨と謙遜の悲痛な叫びを、お聞きください」

languages.text: «Dios Emperador, nuestro pastor y guardián, escuche mi doloroso grito de remordimiento y humildad».
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, our shepherd and warden, hear my sorrowful cry of remorse and humility."

traits.locale_text: «Dios Emperador, nuestro pastor y guardián, escuche mi doloroso grito de remordimiento y humildad».

languages.text: "Gottimperator, unser Hirte und Hüter, höret meinen traurigen Ruf der Reue und Demut."
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, our shepherd and warden, hear my sorrowful cry of remorse and humility."

traits.locale_text: "Gottimperator, unser Hirte und Hüter, höret meinen traurigen Ruf der Reue und Demut."

languages.text: « Empereur-Dieu, notre berger, notre gardien, entendez mon cri chargé de remords et d'humilité. »
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, our shepherd and warden, hear my sorrowful cry of remorse and humility."

traits.locale_text: « Empereur-Dieu, notre berger, notre gardien, entendez mon cri chargé de remords et d'humilité. »

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator, rehberimiz, hamimiz. Nedametimi ve tevazumu elemle haykırıyorum, duy."
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, our shepherd and warden, hear my sorrowful cry of remorse and humility."
